ygData.subject: Re: Another Newbie Question
ygData.msgSnippet: This may be the only thing I don t like about the game because I too am under 18. They only accept credit cards... not sure on who to pay cause I never really
ygData.messageBody:
This may be the only thing I don't like about the
game because I too am under 18. They only accept
credit cards... not sure on who to pay cause I never
really paid much attention to my mom when she was asking
for the money... I was too busy playing EQ. I just
tossed her my waulet and told her to take what it costs
and went back to playing EQ.<br><br>Hehe if I
actually did that to my mom she would have whooped my
butt.<br><br>On another note: Congo Rats Xela Orcbane... I too
took it uppon myself to rid the world of those low
life scum known as the Orcs... they beat me down many
times but my score is still better than theirs.
